content:
Mianrud
Mianrud (Persian: ميانرود‎, also Romanized as Mīānrūd and Meyānrūd; also known as Mianrudan (Persian: میانرودان), also Romanized as Mīānrūdān and Mīān Rūdān)[2] is a city in the Central District of Dezful County, Khuzestan Province, Iran.  At the 2006 census, its population was 9,199, in 1,888 families.[3]
